name: CVE-2010-3961
description: The Consent User Interface (UI) in Microsoft Windows Vista SP1 and SP2, Windows Server 2008 Gold, SP2, and R2, and Windows 7 does not properly handle an unspecified registry-key value, which allows local users with SeImpersonatePrivilege rights to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka "Consent UI Impersonation Vulnerability."
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:sp2:x32:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:*:itanium:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:*:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:itanium:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp1:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:*:x32:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:*:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:*:itanium:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*')]
